data.title: Östra Ljungby climate: Weather Östra Ljungby & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Östra Ljungby

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Östra Ljungby

>>average temperature by month Östra Ljungby

>>Weather Östra Ljungby

The climate is warm and temperate in Östra Ljungby. In Östra Ljungby, precipitation is notable throughout the entirety of the year, with even its most arid month still experiencing a considerable amount of rainfall. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The average temperature in Östra Ljungby is 8.3 °C | 46.9 °F. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 888 mm | 35.0 inch as per the meteorological records.

The designated area is positioned within the northern hemisphere of our globe. The warm and pleasant days of the Summer season commence towards the conclusion of June and come to an end in September. This particular period includes a span of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Östra Ljungby

The driest month is March, with 53 mm | 2.1 inch of rainfall. The maximum quantity of rainfall is observed during the month of August, exhibiting an average value of 105 mm | 4.1 inch.

average temperature by month Östra Ljungby

The warmest month of the year is July, with an average temperature of 17.5 °C | 63.5 °F. During the month of February, there is a notable drop in temperature, with an average low of approximately 0.0 °C | 32.1 °F.

Östra Ljungby weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Östra Ljungby

The closest Airports of Östra Ljungby are: Ängelholm-Helsingborg Airport (AGH) 16.97km,Halmstad Airport (HAD) 56.94km,Kristianstad Airport (KID) 70.47km

You can reach Östra Ljungby from this Cities by Plane: Stockholm (BMA), Jönköping (JKG)
